SourceString: Do you want to move your Personal Portal?

DevComment: The button in the HUD next to the minimap that opens a players personal portal
This will be displayed as location name if no suitable named area can be found

SourceString: Are you sure you want to use this portal?
Cannot travel to ally in combat.
Teleport back to the location of your previous death. Only one <b>Recovery Portal</> can be active at a time.
Are you sure you want to teleport directly to this hero?
